_source.text: Abbas mined NASA's huge repository of footage from the Saturn-orbiting Cassini spacecraft to create a short that manages to capture the eerie emptiness of the cosmos in 2 minutes better than any Discovery Channel special ever could.

text: a short that manages to capture the eerie emptiness of the cosmos in 2 minutes **better** **than** any **Discovery** **Channel** special ever could.

_source.text: About five minutes into David Krentz & Erik Nelson's CG animated feature, Dinotasia , the thought occurred to me that this film didn't look any better than any number of Discovery Channel TV programs.

text: occurred to me that this film didn't look any **better** **than** any number of **Discovery** **Channel** TV programs.
